actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for payment of annuity to an individual who has completed 30 years of service, without regard to such individual's age.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to make individuals who have completed 30 years of services eligible for an annuity regardless of such individuals' age.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for payment of annuity to an individual who has completed 30 years of service, without regard to such individual's age.
